item.title: Runeserver
item.dc:creator: @owned_ur_ass owned ur ass
item.description:
@owned_ur_ass wrote:

this error i get b4 wat he said im testing that now

Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Could not create the Java virtual machine. Press any key to continue . . .

EDIT: Same error. :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 30, 2007, 05:56:11 PM[/size][hr]nvr mind i fixed its

@echo off title ga "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe" -cp . server pause

item.title: Runeserver
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“owned ur ass, post:3, topic:161665”]@echo off
COLOR f0
title GangstaScape PK Server
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./Class; server[/quote]

@echo off
set path=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./Class; server
pause

item.title: Runeserver
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

Go to runserver.bat right click it and select “edit”

Post what’s in it some computers need to have certain stuff in it. Or it’ll open and close fast

OR

Open it and at the bottom add pause and it’ll stay opened but won’t run.
